name: Volkyri Aesthetic Generator
description: Procedural prompt generator for the Volkyri — ancient starfaring warrior-attendants from the Hel Vortex system. Generates distinctive sci-fi feminine martial imagery with signature asymmetrical half-horn, metallic bodysuits, and dramatic lighting.
templates: Volkyri {role} in {primary_metal} metallic bodysuit with {accent_color} accent panels, single {horn_shape} half-horn growing from {horn_side}, bone fused with {horn_sheath} sheathing. {action}. Expression of {expression}. {environment}. {lighting}. {skin_tone} skin, {hair}. {camera}. {style_tag}.

Volkyri {role} wearing form-fitting {primary_metal} chrome attire with {accent_color} trim, asymmetrical {horn_shape} horn emerging from {horn_side} skull. {action}. {expression} gaze. {environment}. {lighting} catches metallic sheen. {camera}, {composition}. {style_tag}, feminine martial elegance.

{role} of the Volkyri in {primary_metal} bodysuit, {accent_color} accents across chest panel, single {horn_shape} horn fused to {horn_side} temple with {horn_sheath} plating. {action}. Expression of {expression}, {eye_detail}. {environment}. {lighting}. {camera} showing {pose_detail}. {style_tag}.

Volkyri {role} in gleaming {primary_metal} bodysuit accented with {accent_color}, single {horn_shape} horn growing from {horn_side} temple, bone structure visible at skull fusion point. {action}. Expression of {expression}. {environment_detail} in background. {lighting}. {skin_tone} porcelain features. {camera}, {composition}. Hel Vortex aesthetic.

{role} bearing the Volkyri mark — {horn_shape} half-horn from {horn_side} skull sheathed in {horn_sheath}. {primary_metal} chrome bodysuit with {accent_color} panel details. {action}. {expression} written across angular features. {environment}. {lighting} creating deep pooling shadows. {camera}. {style_tag}, lethal grace.

Volkyri {role} stands in {primary_metal} metallic attire, {accent_color} accents catching light, asymmetrical {horn_shape} horn emerging from {horn_side} temple. {action}. Eyes showing {expression}. {environment}. {lighting}. {pose_detail}. {camera} emphasizing {emphasis}. {style_tag}.

Portrait of Volkyri {role}: {primary_metal} bodysuit gleaming, {accent_color} trim at collar and wrists, single {horn_shape} horn fused to {horn_side} skull with {horn_sheath} overlay. {expression} expression. {environment}. {lighting}. {skin_tone} skin contrasts dark surroundings. {camera}. {style_tag}, dangerous beauty.
